title: Medipulse
description: Medipulse helps you stay on top of your medication schedule with simple, smart reminders, ensuring you never miss a dose despite your busy daily routine. Stay healthy !

title: Smart Workshop
description: This is a web project for the Software Engineering course. The website, built with PHP technology, is named Bengkel Pintar PSPP and focuses on managing automotive workshops efficiently.

title: Real Merchandise
description: Real Merchandise is your go-to website for official Real Madrid merchandise. Whether you're looking for jerseys, accessories, or memorabilia, we've got it all!
